name: Modern Play Football 2015
description:
Now play Football 2015 and become a master in Football Games.
Modern Play Football 2015 is the modern fantasy football game, with amazing soccer 3D visuals and immersive high quality sound. The realistic graphics and sound effect for football player, football field, stadiums will make the football match come to life on your screen during games.
Controls:
"Pass button" for pass and tackle ,
"Kick button" for shoot the football.
"Direction Key" to control the movement of the player.
Features:
- Game contain 2 different modes.
- Quick mode and tournament mode.
- Top 10 league club teams to choose from.
- Smoother and more realistic and optimised graphics for both players and perfect football stadiums.
Download it and install it on your smart phone and you really love it.
